segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, her hand open, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s counting on her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how risky this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s more worried about getting a cookie than about falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing so close to the stool, and if it tips, she might get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get away with this before their mom notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I have a feeling this isn’t going to end well.
segments.speaker: PAR
